lang.title: User App Language Settings
lang.description: Bot language used on the User App.
lang.warning: This setting is not used within the server where the Bot is installed; the server setting is used.

block.title: Block Setting
block.description: Allow or disallow Quotes to be created from your messages

custom.title: Custom Quote Setting
custom.description: Whether or not to allow fictitious Quotes to be created using your profile
custom.disable_description: Custom Quote may be automatically enabled on servers with less than {{limit}} members. Check this checkbox to disable Custom Quote completely.

default.title: Default Settings
default.description: Default options used when creating a Quote

compact.title: Compact Mode Setting
compact.description: Show or hide the Quote control button

done.title: Done
done.description: Add a “Done” button to Quote. Pressing this button will remove the button from that Quote, making it look like a compact mode. This has no effect when in compact mode.
